page.title: 18ST DENYS CHURCH, IBSTOCK
page.content: The last decade has seen extensive restoration to{St. Denys Parish {Church, Ibstock.} In 1976 a new floor was laid and thefts of lead from the church roof in the late seventies made it necessary for a new roof to be installed. Replacement windows have been fitted and these have incorporated copies of ancient stained-glass coats of arms, including the ecclesiastical coats of arms of Archbishop Laud, a former rector. One of the more interesting changes brought about by the present rector, the Rev. Derek Buxton, has been the unblocking of a window on the south side of the altar which Archbishop Laud ordered to be concealed in 1618. Whitewash from the 1500's was still on some of the ancient stones within the wall.
